Sound Preview Pane (LabVIEW MathScript Window)

Requires: MathScript RT Module (Windows)

This pane appears in the Preview Pane field of the LabVIEW MathScript Window. Select Sound from the Display Type pull-down menu to display this pane.

Note  The Display Type pull-down menu appears only after you select a variable from the Variable List.

Use this pane to play the data as a sound.

This pane includes the following components:

  • Start Sound—Begins playing the data as a sound.
  • Rate—Specifies the frequency at which to play the sound.
  • Continuous—Plays the data as a sound continuously. Click the Stop Sound button to stop playing the sound.
  • Legend?—Specifies whether to display the legend for a graph.
  • Volume—Controls the volume of the sound.
  • Waveform Graph—Plots the data on a waveform graph.
